オプション1: Star Man, Triangle Man, and Square Man floated a raft on the river.

Star Man carefully stepped onto the raft.
The raft held without sinking.
Trapezoid Man shouted, raising both arms in a fist‑pump.

Knot‑tying took know‑how, and none of them had it.
They decided to just wind the rope around and around.

The raft didn't break right away,
but it seemed to be sinking little by little.

(No matter how hard we try, it feels like it'll sink in about three days.
Maybe we just can't make a raft that won't sink.
We may have to make one that sinks slowly and reach the next island before it does.)
